Scripts.OnTabPressed:
if IsShiftKeyDown() then CreaObjEditBoxG:SetFocus(); else
end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: this:SetText(string.gsub(this:GetText(),"%|","")); if this:GetText() and string.find(this:GetText(),"%%t") and UnitName("target") then this:SetText(string.gsub(this:GetText(),"%%t",UnitName("target"))) end

Scripts.OnClick: if IsMounted() then PanelOpen("FicheJoueurOngletInventaire",this:GetName()) else TRPError(ObjectError["NOMOUNT"]); end

if DetectPlanque() then PanelOpen("FicheJoueurOngletInventaire",this:GetName()) else if IconeZone[GetCurrentMapContinent()] == nil or IconeZone[GetCurrentMapContinent()][GetCurrentMapZone()] == nil then TRPError("You can't create a hiding place here."); else TRP_ShowStaticPopup("TRP_CREATE_PLANQUE"); end end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if string.find(this:GetText(),"%[*%]*%%*%(*%)*") then this:SetText(string.gsub(this:GetText(),"%[*%]*%%*%(*%)*","")) end if this:IsVisible() then ShowObjetPerso(); end
